website_summaries.verdict: The ease of installation and use of stick-on battery lights, but these are rechargeable.
pros: Stick on easily using a built-in magnet
Comes with a USB cord for recharging
Great for quick lighting and easy for anyone to install
Motion sensor allows light to come on automatically
cons: Light only lasts about 10 hours after full charging
Only comes on when you need it, which might not be good for overnight lighting

customer_reviews.title: Looks sooo nice and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Whoever created this product--thank you! No batteries, no screws to installl and looks soooo nice!
customer_reviews.author: K. Roc

customer_reviews.title: The two ends draw up nicely to the light
customer_reviews.text: I installed these motion-activated lights in a closet under each shelf. In addition to the double-side adhesive tape / foam that comes in the package, there is also a magnetic strip of metal. I chose to drill a single hole in that strip to attach it to the bottom of each shelf with a flat-head screw. The two ends draw up nicely to the light. This should allow for easy remove them when charging is needed. I was skeptical about the motion-activation when I first unboxed them, but it works exactly as you would expect. Extremely pleased with the outcome and visibility this gives my closet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barney

customer_reviews.title: Additional safety when using stairs in darkness
customer_reviews.text: I am 69 years old and live in a 2 story townhouse with a stair railing that is metal and 15 steps in length to the upper floor. I frequently use the stairs evenings to and from the upstairs bedroom but sometimes don't turn the overhead lights on. I magnetically attached these lights on the railing posts so as I approach the stairs the motion-activated lights automatically turn themselves on and off illuminating the stair area making it safer and easier for me to use the stairs and avoid making a misstep. A cheap and brilliant way for me to add an extra dose of safety and they are narrow enough so they are not visible to guests !
customer_reviews.author: Ron in Palm Springs

customer_reviews.title: Short life so buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these lights 5 months ago. Very shortly after purchase the battery life of the lights began to diminish. The first light failed a week ago(refused to charge). The second one failed this morning. So, while the design is good whoever is the battery supplier is very poor. You will have to ask yourself. Is the price fair for less than half a year of use. For me the answer is no.
customer_reviews.author: H. Russel Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Motion Sensors not working as stated
customer_reviews.text: As with some reviews, I was one of the unlucky ones - my motion sensors do not work as advertised. Too bad because I agree with other reviewers that light emitted and ease of mounting make this a potentially good product. But the motion sensors have serious quality control.
customer_reviews.author: jeffk9

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation & perfect lighting for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect! It was smaller than I expected but the strength of the light is amazing especially when I am using it as an under cabinet function. So easy to install and I love that it is magnetic and rechargeable. I charged it first before actually installing it to my cabinet. Decided to buy another one to cover the rest of my cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: haneen

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Update 6/16/19: One of the two just broke this morning. The part of the device you plug the charging cord into just came out when I unplugged it, so now it is useless. These are a waste of money. Initially this product was great. The sensitivity for motion sensing is about right, good brightness, lasted a few weeks with moderate use on the motion sensing setting. I like that it attaches with adhesive and magnets. However after each time I have charged it, perhaps 5-6 times, the brightness and time between charges has declined drastically. Now I am only getting a week or less off a single charge. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Walker86

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a few weeks, then broke.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to mount inside a glass door mini fridge, so customers can see the small cakes inside for purchase. Each evening, we remove & charge the lights with the charging cord provided. After 2.5 weeks of use, one light was unable to charge because the interior/receiving piece of the charging unit detached and rattled around inside the light stick. About a week later, the second light stick broke in the same fashion. I would like to return these for a refund, but it has been 37 days since they arrived and the return window was 30 days. (One star for myself as well for putting off contacting the company!) I’m pretty bummed; these were great while they lasted.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box these did not want to stay lit once fully charged for more than a day using it on motion sensor and forget it if you want to keep it on for any length of time. Constantly have to charge to use. I don't think the rechargeable batteries were anywhere near new and came at the end of their life. Looking for something to replace them
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lisa Swarm

customer_reviews.title: They didn’t last,
customer_reviews.text: Fully charged before using. One didn’t work with motion sensor, 2 Nd one worked great. Could have been brighter. 1st one died totally after a couple of weeks, 2nd one work for 2 months despite recharging it never held a charge. Don’t purchase not worth the money , Time for returning had expired. Still have them installed hoping they will eventually charge.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Cre

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESES
customer_reviews.text: I love theses lights. i have several. some in the house, some in my camper. I even have one in my beat up truck as a dome light. I have used them as under cabinet lighting in the kitchen, closet lights, night lights for the kids, utility light above the furnace and places in the basement where there was no light. They work great, magnet to things or come with a sticky taped base to place them. I have had one or two that the motion sensor quit working for some reason. i just use them and reg lights then. i guess i could send them back but they work otherwise. so i don't bother. will probably get more. :)
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Mostly excellent except motion detector stinks
customer_reviews.text: Very mixed feelings on these. The pros: bright light, good quality of light, rechargeable, and a really nice system for attaching a small metal strip to the surface where you want them, and then attaching these magnetically to that strip. Makes it really easy to take them out, recharge them, and put them back. Why only 2 stars? The motion detector hardly works at all. I had wanted to put them in a closet and have them turn on when I opened the closet door. It worked about 10% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Love

customer_reviews.title: Cordless Magic
customer_reviews.text: These lights are incredible. My new apartment is lacking closet lights so I gave these a try. I charged them and then installed, so easy. I set them on the motion setting and go into both those closets several times a day and haven't had to recharge yet. They are bright and cordless, just what I needed. When my friends come to see the new apartment they are amazed by these lights. I've placed them lengthwise on the inside door frame and they illuminate the whole closet.
customer_reviews.author: Mia's Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Best LED light ever
customer_reviews.text: Best LED auto light ever. I needed a small, thin light for a key box in a darkened hallway. Love the magnetic mount and the rechargeable feature, no batteries to replace. Came fully charged so I'll see how long it lasts. Gives off a lot of light.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A.

customer_reviews.title: Not Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: At first, these Under the Cabinet lights were great, but after a few months they couldn't hold a charge longer than a week. Now, almost a year since purchase they can't hold a charge more than a day or so. Having to recharge them so often makes them practically useless. I will be discarding these lights and looking for something with longer lasting performance.
customer_reviews.author: Rehabstiff

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but we ended up returning these
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but we ended up returning these. One of them was defective, it would not turn on at all. The other one we purchased did turn on with motion. However, when it would turn off (no motion detected) we would immediately want it to turn on again (motion detected) right after it shut down, and it would not always turn back on as desired. We found ourselves having to "wave" our hands underneath it constantly to get it to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the garret!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t limit yourself as to where you might use these lights. Have you considered the gardenrobe or garret? Fabulous suggestions found in the awkwardly written instruction sheet. Hahah! Using the lights on the motion sense mode and 20 seconds isn’t long enough. I wish they’d stay on longer. Sometimes it’s like a disco in my kitchen as my two lights take turns shining bright. They kick on when the dog walks by, I appreciate it since the corner of our kitchen is dark. Hubs isn’t a fan. When working in that space, easy to switch to consistently on.
customer_reviews.author: .lidds.

customer_reviews.title: Could not be easier to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy and quick charge. We are using to light a closet that would be difficult to hardwire and only needs this kind of lighting. 2 units were just right. That they are rechargeable makes them economical and dependable. USB cables included. The really well thought part is that the light body is magnetic and a metal strip is included. No drilling or measuring needed. Plus, when recharging is required, you just slide/pull it off the metal strip, plug it in and then return it to the strip which securely stays in place with the inch and a quarter double sided adhesive pads; 4 for each light. Will be ordering more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Ringading

customer_reviews.title: Great LED lighting for unusual spots!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these lights for my kitchen alcove, the iron strip w/adhesive pads made positioning quick & easy, did a quick charging of the light strips and now a lighted area over the sink! I like the motion activation feature as they come on & go off as needed! Having a magnetic backing, the light strips pop off easily for re-charging too!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Hogle

customer_reviews.title: Started good but ended up with little light!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the fact that these are bright and the motion detection works well I am disappointed. Got these in May 2019. Use them only when I cook and feel I need the extra light. I have recharged these about 5 times. Now the lights won’t hold a full charge and light is so dim an hour after I start to use it. Not good at all! Gave it a low rating because of how little use I got out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lilliana

customer_reviews.title: set up just fine
customer_reviews.text: Small lights but I wanted something under the cabinet above the sink that didn't require drilling or batteries. Just set them up and they work well. So well, in fact that they were turning on when I was walking by, so I covered the front of the raised sensor with a little bit of black electrical tape so that they will only come on when I am at the sink. I hope they last. I left the black label on that says "label removed will enter dark environment sensing mode" which is what you can see in the photos, but it doesn't really bother me and camouflages the electrical tape.
customer_reviews.author: magill1986

customer_reviews.title: For the Cat
customer_reviews.text: Moved my cats litter box into an enclosure but it was too dark and she would not use it. After installing one of these lights we have no more issues. They are extremely bright, I love they are battery and rechargeable - I recharge once a month and do not need to worry about a cord. I used double sided gorilla tape to install the metal plate and once the light is close to the plate the magnets attach and there is no movement until I remove for recharging.
customer_reviews.author: ChickenVoodoo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent motion-activated rechargable lights for pantry or cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two and have used them for more than three months and charged 3-4 times. I left them in the mode for G mode for motion activation in the kitchen corner where light is insufficient. They turn on when I get nearby and off when I am away. At night, it serves at night lights. They are great to have. I just ordered another two for my cabinets under the counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to order this?
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how bright these lights would be inside my closet but I am thrilled with them. The motion sensor saves me from having to tap a light or install hardwiring. The LED lights provide more than enough light to easily see the labels on my files and boxes. Love the fact that they can be easily recharged via their USB port. My family and friends all want to get some now. Everyone seems to have places in their homes that could use extra lighting.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Provides great lighting
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different types of lights to mount under my cabinets over my sink and coffee maker. I finally found these and my search is now over!!! Pros - They are rechargeable. The magentic strip makes them easy to take down to charge. The led lights are much brighter than others that I have tried. Fast delivery. Cons - The only surprise with this was when I opened my Amazon box it was lit up inside through the packaging because the lights were not in the off position when I received them. Since they are rechargeable that really didn't matter though. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Blooblzr

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the price
customer_reviews.text: I waited 5 months before writing this review because I wanted to properly test them. After this time with using 4 of them in 4 different locations, all of them are still working well, and still holding onto their magnets well. As others have mentioned, you want to make sure you put it where you want it the first time because they will likely not stick well if you use them again. You could theoretically heat them up with a heat gun or blow dryer and then use double sided 3M tape to relocate them. Anyways, they work well in our closets and a hallway where there is not much light. Still holding a charge well too
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We have a hallway in our garage that leads to the door to the house that is so dark, you can't see the keyhole to get into the house. I put one of these at waist high aiming at the keyhole and the other over the door archway. So now when we walk up to the door, both units light up and it's bright enough to see what you are doing. They stay on for about 20 seconds if there is no movement. The other cool thing about these, if you need a flashlight, you can just grab one of these off their magnetic strip and walk around with it. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mjf

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I've looked for an under counter light for a while, but I didn't want to deal with running or hiding power cables. This is a perfect alternative. The counter space nook type area next to my refrigerator doesn't get much light. This is where I make coffee. Popped this thing under the counter, perfect! When I'm making coffee now, I can actually see without having to turn around to the kitchen island to scoop coffee grounds. I also put one in my mailbox so I can see in when I get mail after dark. Again, works great! Checked the temperature limits and it's like 104 F. Should be fine for the Florida summer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: 3 months of great use so far
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for awhile now. I study industrial design and have a keen preference for good design. This package satiates that. The magnetic strips are easy to setup. The rechargeable batteries last long enough to not be too much of a chore. The amount of light is good. I recommend that you make these with different color options. I am actually not a fan of the whitish-blue spectrum you are using. It makes my rather pale Scottish white skin look a little extra pale and almost sickly. I have a personal preference to orange warm light, but that should not effect my rating of the product overall, which I am very impressed and pleased with.
customer_reviews.author: Samroo

customer_reviews.title: I can recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Overall. I am happy with this purchase. I bought more, for all my cupboards. PROS - Bright - Slim - Magnetic mounting - Not ugly CONS - 4 small stickers for each mount, not 1 long one - Stickers are difficult to peel off - Motion sensor not quite sensitive enough, need to wave hand, openning door to cupboard isnt enough most of the time - No charger or wires
customer_reviews.author: Charles F.

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. I have them in my cupboards in my RV. Any time I open my cabinets the lights come on to make it easy to find what I’m looking for. I bought an extra set and put them under my kitchen and bathroom sinks in my home. They were very easy to install and are easy to recharge. I usually recharge them once every two weeks by plugging them in overnight. Perfect lighting for what I need. Worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE! I updated my kitchen by painting the cabinets and wanted to add under cabinet lighting without having to rewire anything. These were the answer!! I bought one set to test them, loved them, so I bought a second set. They did look long in the picture than in real life, so you essentially need one order to properly light under 2 cabinets. The light is bright and clear. I love that they’re magnetic, I’ve definitely taken one off a few times to see more clearly inside a cabinet while reinstalling cabinet doors and to find an item that dropped under the couch. They charge quick and their motion sensitivity is great!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Iversen

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!! Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: These little guys are brilliant! They're small, but powerful. I liked them so much as under-the-cabinet kitchen lights that I ordered two more for the kitchen and another two for use in the RV. I love that they don't require batteries. They charge by USB and the charge seems to last in the 2-3 week range before you notice they are dimming. Just 30 mins on the charger and they're ready to go again. The fact that they just stick to their own magnet bed under the cabinet (no screws or permanent clips) means these would be great for renters or short-term guests. Big, big fan!
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Bait & Switch
customer_reviews.text: The item I received is a cheapo that sells for $4.99 on Amazon. There is no magnetic strip. The lights are cylindrical - not flat as pictured. If you order these $12.99 versions, you might get the $4.99 versions instead, which are completely different - different color temperature, shape, size, color, mounting system (plastic snappy thing is junk), and 0 durability.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Half satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my childs play house in her room and under the cabinets in my kitchen. They work great....however the metal part bent before even getting it under the cabinet and the light now falls every time i put it on the strip.... the other one hasn't fallen and works great but the second one i can't even use because it bent. Really bummed because i didn't get my money worth by not being able to use the second one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: These work great for that job and then will turn off after ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my long dark utility room. The only light switch is near the garage door so I wanted a light to turn on as we walk through the utility room from either direction. These work great for that job and then will turn off after we've left the utility room. Since I have an extra refrigerator and my washer and dryer in there, I was able to allow these to attach to my refrigerator (near the kitchen) and the metal bracket of the shelf over the washer dryer, to give me light throughout the utility room, that doesn't require me to use the one light switch near the garage.
customer_reviews.author: marw

customer_reviews.title: these are great! buy them!
customer_reviews.text: these are amazing! I wanted under cabinet lighting but the cost of installing was literally in the $1000's! I figured I'd try these and they are perfect - they give the same amount of light from previous homes with expensive under cabinet lighting - easy to recharge through a USB port - depending on the use they last about a month before needing recharging. SO easy to install - just put the adhesive strip under he cabinet then the light stays up with the magnetic strip - easy on, easy off to recharge. Amazing especially considering the cost. the motion detector works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: dont buy battery's life is short lived
customer_reviews.text: EDIT TO ADD- I originally gave this products a 5 stars, and even gone back to purchase another set. Unfortunately, the second shipment was not at all like the first shipment. The lights were supposed to last for one month after each fully charged, only lasted for a week. We find ourselves constantly recharging the lights. LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT THESE LITTKE LIGHTS! They are WONDERFUL and so convenient for little odd little dark areas in the house. The sensor works wonder! I was skeptical when I ordered these, but now I am sold! They worked awesome under my kitchen cabinet nook, where I didn’t have any electrical outlet. Would buy them again and again!
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: Great under cabinet lights & for power failures!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased several of these little led lights for under my kitchen cabinets to light up my counter. They charged fast, and the magnet (which is attached to the surface with double-sided tape) is strong. I set them on motion. As I walk along the counter they turn on one by one. The light is bright and stays on just long enough to do what I need to do. They will be especially useful during power failures since they can be removed from the magnet and taken wherever needed. There is an on/off/motion switch. I installed another in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Carolee888

customer_reviews.title: I like that they can be charged and I don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my pantry cabinet shelves. They turn on when I open the pantry cabinet doors, but only when ambient light is low. The light is bright enough to see the contents of the shelf clearly. I have knocked the lights off their stick-on pads a few times moving tall jars but they stick right back on. I like that they can be charged and I don't have to look for batteries. My only complaint is that the instructions never mentioned that the stick on pads have a clear plastic cover that needs to be peeled off. The lights kept falling till I found these and took them off.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These work really well. Very easy to install. You hang a magnetic strip using the provided adhesive pads. You could purchase brackets and screw it in if you want to. Then the lights attach to the magnetic strips making them easy to remove to charge. The lights come with a mini USB to USB adapter. You can charge in a computer or using any adapter like you would for your phone. I love the motion sensor feature. I walk into the kitchen at night with a plate and glass in my hand and it sensed me and turned on as I walked to the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Papaya-7277

customer_reviews.title: Makes the cabinet easy to see
customer_reviews.text: I have both of these stuck inside a metal cabinet in an area that doesn't get a ton of light. The 1st one is pointed out so it activates when I open the door, the 2nd on is on top so it activates when you put your hand inside. Now I can easily see what I want. The lithium batteries last forever and are the main thing I was looking for. Previously I had a manually activated light but it seemed like the batteries where dead every time I went into the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Britten

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and well-made, works really well I have had them for over a year
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for over a year and they work great in closets and have a motion detection setting that turns them on for 30 seconds. I have one in the pantry and coat closet. Super easy to charge. Once a month I collect them all and put them on my nightstand and charge each one with my phone charger. I know when their done when they flash green. Just last night the power went out and I went and grabbed one of these out of the closet and was bright enough to see what I was putting together at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Liz M.

customer_reviews.title: Good light, holds a charge a long time.
customer_reviews.text: These put out a lot of light. Love the magnetic back, goes lots of places. I use it as a bath night light. It stays on for about 10 seconds before shutting off. I have to charge it about once a month or less. I have one in a basement area that gets less use and I have not charged it since Christmas and it is now March 22! Recharges quickly through the USB port. Bought some for stocking stuffers and everybody loves them. Will take them in our camper and use them as a reading light. Would also work as a work light for your auto with the magnetic strip.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Furbee

customer_reviews.title: Motion sensor OR on all the time!
customer_reviews.text: When I originally bought these lights, they did not come with the metal plate in the back and I was quite upset. I ended up contacting the seller and they sent me three extra packages of lights (6 more lights) free of charge. Now that I have them in my kitchen, I love them! I love the fact that you can either have them set up as a motion sensor or to be on all the time. I do charge them every two or three days but I use them a lot. Love the fact that I can just stick them on anywhere and don’t have to ruin my cabinets. Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Irina H.

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS LIGHTS
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love love love these lights! I ordered one set originally and love them so much I ordered a second set. They are very bright and light up very nicely for under the cabinet lighting. I originally bought a different brand but I love these so much more. I like the fact that it has three settings, On, off and motion. When you set it in the on position it stays on constantly as a wonderful night light or you can set it on motion. I also like that when you do set it on motion it stays on longer than the other brand I bought. I highly recommend these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without these
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought 2 sets of these lights. I ma about to buy 2 more. They are so good. They charge quickly and easily. They keep their charge. Plus, they do what they say they will do, they come on when you walk by them. They are so quick and easy to install. The lights are also strong enough to give sufficient light for me to make a cup of tea without using the overhead light. Or to see in my closet! Those dark areas in my home, like my closet, benefited from these. I am going to use these as night lights in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Durham Lass

customer_reviews.title: Works great, when it works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to light up a very dark stoop. I placed the lights outside, under some eaves, after fully charging them and they worked great for about 3 days. Now, though, one of them works intermittently even when switched to "on" and the other just simply will not work. They both are charged up, they both show green lights when we plug them in, but they just aren't working correctly. I know they are not waterproof, but I don't have them in areas that are affected by rain so I don't believe that's a problem. They're cold, but they would be just as cold in my basement so I'm not sure that's an issue either.
customer_reviews.author: Angela D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and useful!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these!!! I lucked out in buying a beautiful old china cabinet for a song at a thrift store, but something is hinky with the lights. I applied these inside the top border and they throw a beautiful light at night over the glassware and make a nice nightlight when we have guests who might need to wander past for a bedtime snack. They work well, the batteries last a long time, and they were really easy to put up. I will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: PalliNurse

customer_reviews.title: One stopped detecting motion - stays on 24/7
customer_reviews.text: I did love these, and still do love the one that works, but the other one stopped working with motion detection, and now if I leave it in the "G" mode, it will just stay on 24/7 and run out of a charge very quickly. So I have to turn it off and manually turn it back on, which isn't the worst thing in the world, but I use these in a place where I'm cleaning things, and my hands are either very dirty, or very wet, so the motion detection was kind of a necessary feature.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Good Lights
customer_reviews.text: Fast charging, on demand lighting. The motion sensor discernably detects movement so as to not kill the battery unnecessarily and require a constant charge. The next best thing to hardwired lights. Im an electrician, and my next home project is my under cabinet lighting. These have allowed me to postpone that job for a little while longer. I highly recommend these. Ive ordered 4 sets, and will order more as needed.
customer_reviews.author: House Of Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights
customer_reviews.text: I followed a video that was submitted by another buyer in which he showed how to make the motion sensor work in low light. I followed his instructions ( it was not as easy as he indicated, but it worked) and the light works great for us. They are installed under a cabinet where our coffee maker is located and in the early morning when we make our coffee the lights come on and illuminate that area very well and turn off when we walk away We like them. Some reviewers felt the light was not bright enough but it is just right for us. Easy install and charging too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Coon

customer_reviews.title: Love love love.. the best one you'll find.  So much better than QVC ones!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the very expensive ones on QVC and you have to charge them almost every other day. So irritating. I came across these and thought what do i have to lose?.. these are the most fantastic thing.. i set them on automatic above my Keurig and the pod/tea area and i only have to charge them about once a week sometimes less than that. They are very sensitive too. My chihuahua walking by them and they turn on. Which is great anyway because he's afraid to go in the kitchen at night when its dark. He used to come get one of us, now he goes by himself.. yay.. a 2fer!! Win win!!
customer_reviews.author: Katygurl

customer_reviews.title: A lot for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: We have been trying to decide on what or if we will under cabinet lights in our kitchen. My wife saw this somewhere (probably on Amazon) and suggested I look them over. As it says there easy to install, lights are bright and the battery lasts for a long time. My wife left one on all night and when I woke up it was still lit - a little dimmer but still on. I don't use the motion detector because I like the lights to stay on when I need them. We liked them so much we ordered two more sets.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kellick

customer_reviews.title: Great stick on lights
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty impressed with these lights. I did not think these lights would be bright enough because of the size, but I was wrong. I am utilizing them in my closet (approximate size is 5 square feet). I utilized both lights and it is very bright, also too bright, it is like daylight in my closet. I have the lights set for motion sensor setting which is a great feature because I do not have to turn them on and off all the time. If you are looking for additional wireless lighting needs I recommend these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lavoie

customer_reviews.title: Will be ordering more
customer_reviews.text: Needed something easy to put in my closet that didn’t require me to run an extension cord. This was the perfect solution works great! Love that it comes with sticker magnets to connect to where u need the lights to be. Also the motion sensor works great. They last a long time and get low when it’s time for a charge. Very easy and simple.
customer_reviews.author: franco

customer_reviews.title: They’re good!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: They lose battery life very fast and only last a few hours. Some die very fast. Unfortunately had to throw them away. Great option if you don’t have under cabinet lighting. It doesn’t really last super long after you charge (if you leave in constant “on mode”). I’d say about 5 hours. But they’re good and it’s nice to be able to recharge them. Also, they’re day light... I bought a yellow film and glued over it to give it a warm feel.
customer_reviews.author: V. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great lil light & motion sensor has worked well. The only drawback I’ve noticed is the magnet doesn’t hold the light very well. Granted, I put it in a cabinet of our bus - which goes bumping down the road. I would definitely recommend this product for stationery areas. Only owned for 1 month so cannot attest to its longevity.
customer_reviews.author: JR in Lafayette

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the other reviews, mine have lasted months in my closet that I use frequently and only have to charge every so often. I have two lined up in my closet underneath the stairs so the space is small and lights up with just enough light to find items tucked away. The light automatically turns off, sometimes too soon and I have to wave towards the light to get them to turn on for a little bit longer. A year later and still working great! Love it for my under the stairs closet!
customer_reviews.author: STP

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my mountain house rental property and places them under the kitchen cabinets. They work great and have a long lasting battery life, at least a week. Quality made and very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Heath McCormick

customer_reviews.title: I love these lights
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for inside cabinets, drawers, stairs, and anywhere a motion detector light is needed. More than bright enough for small areas. Easy to recharge with a USB charger cord (internal charge LED glows red when charging, green when finished). The magnetic mount allows easy removal for repositioning or charging. One of my lights is now mounted on my Rollator Walker so I can see where I'm going at night. Excellent product, well made, exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: 57monroe

customer_reviews.title: You will want these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Invention EVER!! Ordered to replace the old plug in under cabinet lights, which have turned the bottom of my kitchen cabinet dark. Potential fire hazard so out with the old and IN with my new LED lights. So EASY for me to charge and put up. I'm ordering more!!! Love these!! Give it 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! These work AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little lights. I bought a set of 2 for my metal shed about 2 months ago. They have yet to even need another charge! They're magnetic & actually stick to the insides of my metal she'd doors, so when we open the door & walk in, the lights turn on. I'm buying 2 more sets for our covered front porch. UPDATE: We purchased a 2nd set of these lights. One of the new ones won't hold a charge for more than an 2 minutes, but the other 3 still work great! I hardly ever have to charge them & they're always bright. I wish they all worked, but the 3 I do have are great!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya M

customer_reviews.title: Need to be charge A LOT
customer_reviews.text: I gave them four stars because they are terrific, nice looking little lights. They are easy to put up with double sided tape and magnets included and I have them under my kitchen cabinets. The problem is they need to be charged a lot. I took off one star for that reason. I've gotten into a routine to charge them at night and put them back up in the morning. The charge lasts a few days and the motion sensor works well (put it on the correct setting "G" for the motion sensor to work)
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: These are very functional. I wasn’t sure if where. Was going to put these. I put one in my spice rack drawer and the other in the garage. Great motion detection and goes right off at 20 secs. Very convenient. I would use these if I had elderly parents. I’d put them very where if I did. They fall due to poor lighting a lot of times.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Fritts

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect! It gives off enough light
customer_reviews.text: We have a small dark galley kitchen and needed something to provide more light over the sink especially after the sun goes down. These were perfect! It gives off enough light, even at night to not have to turn on the main light. I love that they are motion activated and that they are easy to remove and charge during the day when I don't need them as much. They charge quick and last a long time. I'm so glad we bought them. They also don't turn on (even if you have them on motion activated) if there is enough light so it saves the battery. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these lights for our overlanding roof top tent trailer. They were recommended from some friends and we love them! You can move them where you need them or leave them in place. They are compact and were so bright! You can either use them as motion lights or leave them on. They have very strong magnets. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Kipp

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights!!
customer_reviews.text: Lights work really well. Easily charged. Not too big but give off a lot of light. Very happy with this purchase. Will probably order another set.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Perry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for "those" places
customer_reviews.text: There are places...hallways, bathrooms, kitchens...places you find yourself at night where you don't want or need to turn on the lights but you still need to see. This is your answer! Since they are magnetic I have one attached to a hanging rod in the laundry room and one just propped on its end in the corner of the bathroom by the sink. They motion detect and come on when I walk in (if it is dark) and stay on for about 20-seconds. They recharge in less than an hour and then work for weeks. These were exactly what I needed and I hope you'll be just as satisfied with yours.
customer_reviews.author: whitty

customer_reviews.title: Stick-on Anywhere Portable Little Light...
customer_reviews.text: These arrived and I installed them immediately after charging the batteries. They are smaller than I had anticipated and yet the do work nicely: they give off sufficient light to see individuals in the room. They are 7.25" long and 1" wide. While they have rechargeable batteries, they do not really offer sufficient light for reading recipes at night as I had hoped -- even with the two light on, about 18-24" apart.....[they are perpendicular to one another on different cabinets....] Still it is nice to have the light available at night as needed when on auto.
customer_reviews.author: spirits&angels

customer_reviews.title: they are good and bright but have to be recharged about weekly
customer_reviews.text: The fixture stopped working underneath my microwave. I opted to buy these. I like them that's be recharged too often but aside from that they worked well. I may buy another longer one that I saw on Amazon I would buy them again though. They come with stickum tape and magnets Four Non metal services. They automatically stick to metal on their own
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S

customer_reviews.title: Installed them with velcro
customer_reviews.text: I installed these with Velcro that i got from my sister as she had these and pointed out that they need to be charged quite often, so when they're stuck on with adhesive its kind of an issue to charge them unless they are right by an outlet. with the Velcro stick i can just pop them off and charge them anywhere. You have to be decently close for the light to turn on but they work for me.
customer_reviews.author: TMelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for certain applications.
customer_reviews.text: These are (like most anything else) perfect for certain applications. I can see where they might not be bright enough for under-cabinet lighting and they do turn off rather quickly. Having said that, I needed lighting inside a large and deep pantry cabinet and these are perfect - I bought 2 sets and put one under each shelf and they come on when the doors are opened (if it's too light outside then they sometimes won't come on until they "see" hand motion). Inexpensive and much better than the old battery-powered lights that I had.
customer_reviews.author: GEJBOOKS

customer_reviews.title: This is the Light you want!!!
customer_reviews.text: These Lights are the Bomb! I mean it. I am a FT-RV'er. I Love them and I could go on and on. They Provide a lot of Light without blinding you. Do not think twice. You get what you pay for! Do not buy the disposable battery lights. Not saying they are all bad. The rechargeable battery, in this light, last a good while and its so easy to plug & charge. The adhesive tape and metal strip, along with the Magnet built in, hold Very Very well! I am a very happy RV'er!
customer_reviews.author: Michael F

customer_reviews.title: Cool lights!
customer_reviews.text: The lights are easy to charge and install. You definitely have to charge about 1x per week so if this doesn’t bother you then great. I wish they lasted longer but on the plus side they’re very easy to install and recharge. The light they emit is a cool white and I like the motion sensors that turn the lights on but it can be too much when it you have several under cabinets in kitchen because it seems like they go off in alternating fashion. But they work and that’s what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: These attach to cabinets using a magnet.
customer_reviews.text: So far I haven’t gotten the motion detector to work but that’s okay. It comes with a magnet for installation on the bottom of your cabinet. My cabinets are made of wood or partical board not metal. So, I had to use double sided tape to install the lights. I hope they stay on. They put off plenty of light.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Tennyson

customer_reviews.title: Great little lights !
customer_reviews.text: So far these have worked out great. Easy to set up. I’ve had them for 3 weeks. One needed charging yesterday. It is easy to do and there is a green light that comes on when charging is complete. I put them under the counter above my coffee maker. They respond well to motion and don’t stay on long. I put one further back towards the wall and the front one always comes on. I have to wave my hand under the back one if I want extra light. I’m not sure if my placement causes it not to detect motion like the forward one does. It’s fine and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amyinsc

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Lights!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights! I installed mine under my kitchen cabinets, and they've made prepping things on the counters so much easier with the extra light. The magnetic strips make these easy to install and to adjust the position of the light if needed. I've had mine for 3 weeks now, and I have not had to recharge them yet. I like these so much that I just bought a second set.
customer_reviews.author: ATX

customer_reviews.title: Aquarium Sump Lights
customer_reviews.text: Alright, so here's a great use for these lights. I set up a new aquarium and wanted to light the cabinet so I could see the sump and stuff. Stuck the adhesive to the metal plates, popped the plates to the back of the cabinet and slapped the lights to the plates. Now, everytime I work under the tank I have a perfect light source that doesn't require manual toggling and they turn off after 20 seconds reliably. The USB charging is an elegant solution while others use wasteful and clunky batteries. Excellent purchase. Would buy again. Buy local. Tip your waitress.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard E Robinson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Motion sensor works great
customer_reviews.text: I have the two of these set up in the bedroom and master bath, I can get out of bed and get to the bathroom in the middle of the night without turning on the overhead light and waking my wife. Get back into bed and the light turns itself off. You do have to position the one in the bedroom so your tossing and turning in the night does not trigger the light. They attach with double-sided sticky that holds a steel bar. Magnets in the light hold it to the steel. Recharge with a USB port.
customer_reviews.author: W. A. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good..
customer_reviews.text: So far the actual lights work really well and the fact that you can recharge them is perfect! Replacing batteries all the time is a joke. However, I used the included sticky pads to adhere these underneath my cabinets which worked great except for one of the metal/magnetic plates that's supposed to stay attached to the cabinet came unstuck from the sticky pads. I thought for sure if anything came unstuck it would come unstuck from our actual cabinet but that was not the case. I guess I'll just have to buy some command strips from the store to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: MrsWay

customer_reviews.title: Started well but........
customer_reviews.text: It's very compact and generates a good amount of light. Love the fact that the magnetic strip allow you to mount almost anywhere. Two (2) came in the box, but only one is working well. I used the option for motion sensing. Almost right out of the box, the motion sensor on one of them is faulty. It keeps coming on and going off even though there is nothing moving close to it. I'll have to switch this one on and off, although this was not my preference.
customer_reviews.author: A. Holder

customer_reviews.title: Light the way!
customer_reviews.text: Love my lights! You will too! You don’t need to buy batteries. Just charge them with the usb cable. I have one in the entrance and one in the hall way. I have them both on sensor. When I walk in the house the lights go on. If I go to the kitchen in the middle of the night the lights go on. Perfect! They have a magnetic strip in the back that you can mount and un mount. I want to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: SportsMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: I installed a bunch of these in my camper. I put them in cabinets, storage areas, and even in the bathroom (since my kids are too young to reach the light). The magnets are great and I haven’t had any of the lights fall down even when being towed. The motion sensors have good distance, and the lights are bright enough to light the bathroom well enough to see.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Nietupski

customer_reviews.title: 50-50 % chance of usable/long life-usage be careful!
customer_reviews.text: While, I like the features and how they work; the power in-port receiver on several weak and broke on three of the ones I bought. It seems the mounting on the import/receiver very weak and breaks away after once or twice plugging the power line into the light feature after two to three plug-in. This could even get worst if have to plug into charger in future use
customer_reviews.author: TEP

customer_reviews.title: I can move my light and not have to turn it on!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights! I originally bought 2 for my closets and loved the fact I could remove it from the magnetic strip and use it as a handheld for lower in my closet! Now I have more for extra light in the kitchen and the motion sensor really works ...as I walk by the coffee bar the light automatically comes on so I dont have to disturb the household turning on the reg light! Im looking for other uses as well. Would love them to come woth an extra stick up bar so I can make it mobil from one side to another.
customer_reviews.author: June Musick

customer_reviews.title: The perfect functional accent under my kitchen cabinets.
customer_reviews.text: After checking out dozens of lights to mount under my kitchen cabinets. I lucked upon these lights. I was looking for wireless, motion detection, and enough light. Easy to install. Choice if manual on, motion detection all the time or just in dim or dark conditions. they pick up motion well , easy to install and bright enough to function. The perfect functional accent. Cannot comment on how often they will require charging. But well worth giving them a try.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely happy with these!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Bought them for my garage and front door, & couldn't be more happier! I don't like to leave the front door light on b/c it attracts bugs so I put one of these on above the door. As soon as I come home at night and get to the door with my keys in hand it lights up quick and with ease. It's brighter when recently charged (obviously) so unlike batteries where they just straight up die. These at least give you a heads up to when they need a charge! (The light is still bright enough to see, but you'll notice the dimness)
customer_reviews.author: DejiahDP

customer_reviews.title: Great little light.  I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little light. Applied it inside the hall closet frame and it comes on and lights up the entire closet. Such a nice change to have all the coats lit up so you can see what you are selecting. We don't have a hallway light that shines into the closet, so this was a great addition. I also like that it can be removed easily and recharged. It's been installed for several months now and is still bright. Great little light. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Cruz Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Great lights and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I charged them for a couple of hours to start out at full power. I have two desks that don't have great lighting. One has a metal overhang, so I was able to just slip that one under the overhang and was attached via magnet. The other one has a wood overhang. For that one, I had to install the enclosed metal strip with the enclosed sticky pads and it attached via magnet to that metal strip. Both were easy to do and are removable to recharge via enclosed USB charging cords.
customer_reviews.author: Eleta K. Parris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for gun safes
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I was very pleased by the way they felt and how bright they were. I purchased (4) to use inside my gun safe to replace some other crappy battery powered ones that I bought on amazon awhile ago. The charging light is a nice touch. Thr motion sensor seems to work pretty well overall. Sometimes I have to wave my hand right in front of it and other times, it turns on before I am even close to it. Over all, I’m pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Love the magnets!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I love that their magnetic. Stuck one to my sink underneath and when I open the cabinet door, the light comes on just where you’d need it! They recharge quickly via usb. The only issue I’ve had (I used them for under-cabinet lighting as well) is that when they’re set to the motion detection setting, they only register motion if it’s somewhat dark in the room. If the overhead light in my kitchen is on, the motion sensing doesn’t work. I kind of like that though, because it doesn’t waste the battery charge when it’s really not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor M Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light for the inside of a cabinet where it was super dark and this light did the job. It didn't come with intructions but instillation is simple. It comes with sticky pads, a magnetic strip, and the light. Place the magnetic strip with the sticky pads where you wish it to be and the light being magnetic stays in place. When you need to recharge it you simply separate the light from the magnet strip and when you are done but it I’m place again. It’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Vela

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2-story house and we have old dogs. We put these lights along the baseboards in the hallway for our guests to navigate to the bathroom at night and also so that our little dogs can navigate the stairs easily at night. We have them along the hallway and along the stairs. We recharge them as needed. They are attached to the wall by magnets which we stuck to the wall using the Command sticky stuff (that come with the Command hooks). Easy, great way to light the way.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: worth the price....and then some
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous product. I live in a studio apartment where plugs are a commodity. These lights pop right on when I come into the kitchen and stay on while I wash dishes, etc. The LED light is cool, so there is no extra heat. You can charge it with any android cable and the magnetic strip holds the light in place so it can be taken down for charging. Ingenious! No damage to the surface when you remove the tape segments. It is definitely worth the investment if you are looking for lighting without the hassle of needing an extra plug. Get it...enough said!
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA TATUM

customer_reviews.title: Very annoying. The light color is more bright daylight than ...
customer_reviews.text: The stick keeps dropping from the cabinet. Very annoying. The light color is more bright daylight than soft white. Will use this to put on some of my pantry closet instead. Not very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: choose carefully where to locate these.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful where you put these. There is a metal strip that attaches to a surface and the light attaches to the metal strip. However, when I moved the metal strip, it became "wrinkled" and the light didn't attach very well. I just got the lights so I'm not sure how they last. The light is pretty bright. Update: I got in touch with the vendor and he sent me extra metal strips so that I can move the lights. So they rate 5 stars. I attach to computer to recharge so no need to buy batteries. I'm happy now.
customer_reviews.author: Pat P

customer_reviews.title: Small but bright.
customer_reviews.text: We immediately put one up under a cabinet in the kitchen. Perfect. We have one overhead light and it casts a shadow over our work area. Now there's light. Yeah. Love the motion sensor(my cat set it off a few times last night) and that my cell phone cord can recharge it. Be aware that on/off switch is in one end and it's small, I couldn't find it at first. We are still contemplating where to put second one, over kitchen sink or my hubby's closet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I put these on my vanity
customer_reviews.text: I put these around my small vanity mirror to provide extra light while I do my makeup. I like that you can recharge these, which is more efficient than having to constantly change batteries. I would advise not to stick these onto your furniture until you're sure of where you want them placed, because the magnetic component really sticks and is difficult to take off.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: The setup is so easy and quick. Decision to place has to be definite because the adhesive sticks well
customer_reviews.text: I needed lights under my cabinet in the kitchen and I ordered these. I will order more I love these lights. Thinking the lights were longer In length, I was surprised when I open the box and saw these lights about were about 3 inches wide and12 inches long. I just assume they would be a bit wider and a bit longer. In fact I think the lights are perfect. (No I didn't read the measurements). Charge them first on your lap top before using it may take about 15 minutes, then easy set up. I will absolutely order more. I need one for my utility room.
customer_reviews.author: krystlelyte

product_meta.title: Stick-on Anywhere Portable Little Light Wireless LED Under Cabinet Lights 10-LED Motion Sensor Activated Night Light Build in Rechargeable Battery Magnetic Tap Lights for Closet, Cabinet (Silver2)
product_meta.description:
Color:Silver2

Built-in magnet 

 

Refrigerator iron,The magnet sticks to where you are wanting the light to be, and then the light itself has a magnet built into it.Please stick to the non-rion postion together with the sheetiron & sticky tape.

 

Color:Silver

 

Specifications:

 

Color temperature: 6000-6500K(Cool white) 

 

LED life: >50000H

 

LED Quantity: 10 SMD 2835

 

Luminous flux: 100lm (+/- 20%)

 

Battery powered: 3.7V (build-in 850 mAh Polymer lithium battery)

 

Influence Distance: 3m/10ft (+/- 20%) 

 

Influence Angle: 100(+/-20%)

 

Charging parameter: 5V, 500mA (or 1000mA)

 

Size: 7.5*0.5*1.33in

 

Package:

 

1x LED light

 

1x Operation instruction

 

1x Micro USB cable 

 

1x Sheet iron

 

4x Sticky Tape

 

Tips:

 

1.Not waterproof, do not use this product in damp places.

 

2.Please charge at least once a month to extend battery's life if not in use for long time.

90-Day Money Back Guarantee

 

If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, please contact us. Our RXWL team to you will make things right！
feature_bullets: Working Mode:One end has a three way switch which is ON-OFF-G set it to always on or motion-sensor, or off It uses simple sticky tapes to tape the light anywhere you want it to be.and then the light itself has a magnet built into it
Super Bright & Rechargeable:Built-in rechargeable 850mAh polymer lithium battery
Motion Sensor: Automatically senses human motion within 10ft/120° and shuts off after about 20 seconds of no movement

Built-in Magnet to Stick on Any ironwork:Very easy to install and get setup no need drilling or extra switch. pretty compact and stylish, so you can remove the light from the magnet for charging or as a hand-held light
Various applications:It can be placed in a closet, drawer, cabinet or any other dark place

specifications.Usage: Suitable for closets attics garages cars sheds storage rooms bedroom baby room cabinet corridor workshop basement kitchen coat closet drawer or any other dark place
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,814 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
